name: Block Buster - Demo
description:
Block Buster is a challenging action-puzzle platformer. Since it will still be in development for a while, we decided to release this demo build to see if you guys enjoy it so far :)

Bust all the blocks to beat a stage, but watch out, there will be several obstacles along the way.  Mastering the controls and the rhythm of the game is essential to getting through the stages and acquiring time medals.

The demo consists of 20 stages from the full game, which get increasingly harder and show off many of the different game mechanics. You will die. A lot.

The full game will be released on itch.io and Steam when it's finished. Since I can only work on the game in my free time, next to my full job, I can't say for sure when we are able to release the full game, since there is still a lot of work todo.

If you want to donate to support the completion of the game, I will send you a key after the game is released (min 1.00$). It's greatly appreciated :)

The full game will feature (atleast) 60 stages, boss battles and a speedrun mode, for players who enjoy perfecting their runs and shaving off milliseconds off of every stage.

Controls: 

- A/D to move left and right

- ESC for pause

- R to restart the stage

Leave some feedback in the comments whether it is good or bad. We really wanna know your true opinion towards the game and we're pumped to finally release this demo.

Thank you for checking this out!

Thomas - Kyril Games
